name: edubox-monorepo
description: EduBox - Intelligent student hub with AI assistance

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:convex" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.setup:
npm run install:all && echo '
âœ… Dependencies installed!

Next steps:
1. Copy frontend/env.example to frontend/.env.local
2. Fill in your API keys
3. Run: npm run dev
'
